abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews performance by ensemble Yarn/Wire, presenting premiere of Michael Gordon piece Material, at Miller Theater at Columbia University.

headline.print_headline: Plucking and Striking, Rubbing and Strumming
headline.main: Review: Yarn/Wire Plucks and Strikes, Rubs and Strums

snippet: The group performed the premiere of Michael Gordon’s “Material,” a piece inspired by the racket of construction work.
lead_paragraph: The group performed the premiere of Michael Gordon’s “Material,” a piece inspired by the racket of construction work.
